item.title: Battery Swapping Policy in India: A Complete Guide to NITI Aayog’s Vision, Business Models, and EV Infrastructure Opportunities (2025)
item.description: India’s electric mobility story is fast evolving, and with it comes the growing need for faster, more flexible, and scalable charging solutions. While conventional plug-in EV charging stations are expanding, the Indian government, through NITI Aayog, has introduced a game-changing alternative — Battery Swapping.
